edu.purdue.cs.encourse.service.impl

Class CourseServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.purdue.cs.encourse.service.impl.CourseServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CourseService

    @Service(value="CourseService")
public class CourseServiceImpl
extends Object
implements CourseService
    Contains implementations for all services which may be used by course personnel (Professors and TAs) Primarily used internally from other services, however some services are called directly for certain functionality
    Author:
    William Jordan Reed, reed226@purdue.edu

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int createDirectory(String semester, String courseID)
      Creates a directory for storing all student repositories, test cases, and Makefiles used by the course
      JSONReturnable getCheating(String projectID, List<String> userNames)
      Obtains analysis for which students are likely cheating on a project Primarily used for showing signs of academic dishonesty

      Obtains information on commit history by day for several students Primarily used for showing the list of most recent commits in a group of students
      org.json.simple.JSONArray getCourseData(String userName, List<String> courseIDs)
      Obtains data for all courses that an account is associated with Primarily used internally to generate the JSON for front-end to parse
      org.json.simple.JSONObject getOperationData(String projectID)
      Obtains information on any operation currently being done for a project Primarily used to keep the user updated on progress for a time consuming operation
      JSONReturnable getProgress(String projectID, List<String> userNames)
      Obtains information on amount of progress each student specified has made on a project Primarily used for graphs which show progress over time on front-end
      Project getProject(String projectID) 
      org.json.simple.JSONArray getProjectData(String semester, String courseID)
      Obtains data for all projects associated with a courseID and semester Primarily used to find projects for a course that a user selects
      org.json.simple.JSONArray getSectionData(String semester, String courseID)
      Obtains data for all sections associated with a semester and courseID Primarily used to display the sections for a professor's course
      JSONReturnable getSimilar(String projectID, List<String> userNames)
      Obtains information on similarities between students' projects Primarily used for showing signs of academic dishonesty on front-end
      String getSourceWithChanges(String projectID, String userName, String startCommitHash, String endCommitHash, String sourceName)
      Obtains a specified source file with changes between specified commit hashes Hashes will typically be the last commit on the previous day for start and last commit on the current dsy for end Primerily used to show a file with all changes between the hashes
      JSONReturnable getStatistics(String projectID, List<String> userNames)
      Obtains various statistics for a group of students for a project Primarily used for showing class and group statistics summaries
      JSONReturnable getStudentAdditionsAndDeletions(String projectID, String userName)
      Obtains information on additions and deletions that a student has made for a project Primarily used for displaying the information in an additions and deletions graph
      JSONReturnable getStudentCommitCounts(String projectID, String userName)
      Obtains each day's commit count for a student's project Primarily used for displaying the information in a commits over time graph
      JSONReturnable getStudentCommitList(String projectID, String userName)
      Obtains files modified and major files changed for each day that student has worked on project Primarily used for showing a brief commit history on the student page
      JSONReturnable getStudentCommitVelocity(String projectID, String userName)
      Obtains analysis on progress per commit for a student Primarily used for showing signs of academic dishonesty
      org.json.simple.JSONArray getStudentData(List<String> userNames)
      Obtains data for all of the students with the specified usernames Primarily used as a generalized way to obtain student data for professors or TAs

      Obtains information on amount of progress that a student has made on a project Primarily used for graphs which show progress over time on front-end

      Obtains various statistics for a student's work on a project Primarily used for showing student statistics summaries

      Obtains data for all test scripts associated with a project Primarily used to show existing test scripts that a project has
      JSONReturnable getTestSummary(String projectID, List<String> userNames)
      Obtains information on current test results for several students Primarily used for showing which test cases are being passed on front-end
      int runTestallForStudent(String projectID, String userName)
      Runs a testall immediately for a particular student Primarily used for quickly running a testall on a particular student without having to test the entire class

      Sets only the directory used for each section in the database, without creating it on the server Mainly used internally for courses which already have repositories cloned

      • getSourceWithChanges

        public String getSourceWithChanges(@NonNull
                                   String projectID,
                                   @NonNull
                                   String userName,
                                   @NonNull
                                   String startCommitHash,
                                   @NonNull
                                   String endCommitHash,
                                   @NonNull
                                   String sourceName)
        Obtains a specified source file with changes between specified commit hashes Hashes will typically be the last commit on the previous day for start and last commit on the current dsy for end Primerily used to show a file with all changes between the hashes
        Specified by:
        getSourceWithChanges in interface CourseService
        Parameters:
        projectID - Identifier for project that source is being taken from
        userName - Front-end identifier for student whose source is being shown
        startCommitHash - Hash corresponding to the commit with the initial state of the file
        endCommitHash - Hash corresponding to the commit with the final state of the file
        sourceName - Name of the source file being analyzed
        Returns:
        Path to a new file with the entire source file and additions and deletion shown inline

      • runTestallForStudent

        public int runTestallForStudent(@NonNull
                                String projectID,
                                @NonNull
                                String userName)
        Runs a testall immediately for a particular student Primarily used for quickly running a testall on a particular student without having to test the entire class
        Specified by:
        runTestallForStudent in interface CourseService
        Parameters:
        projectID - Identifier for the project being tested
        userName - Front-end identifier for the student being tested
        Returns:
        Error code
